task.summary: Added constructor, getters and setters for Message
Added TargetNotFoundException for when message targets are not found
Added message target to Message class
Added ClientThread class to deal with clients
Added messages printed when server runs
Added send message methodology for ClientThread
Command Line Launcher (should save some work as I seem to keep having to write these)
Yeah too lazy to implement CLI Launcher
Added support for common CLI stuff
Prevented StackOverflow (infinite recursion) in getType() AND fixed semicolon :3
Added ServerReadThread for reading messages from the server
Added ability to set username/name from CLI

Added GUI shizzle
Fixed some protocol issues

Added GUI shizzle
Fixed some protocol issues
